# <a name="how-to-find-options-in-outlookcom-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="93f8b-102">如何在 Outlook.com 设置中查找选项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93f8b-102">How to find options in Outlook.com settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="93f8b-103">在页面顶部, 选择齿轮图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93f8b-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="93f8b-104">打开 "设置"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93f8b-104">to open Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="93f8b-105">在设置窗格的底部, 选择 "[**查看所有 Outlook 设置**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage)"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93f8b-105">At the bottom of the Settings pane, select [**View all Outlook settings**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="93f8b-106">这将显示 "常规"、"电子邮件"、"日历" 和 (如果适用) 高级设置和选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="93f8b-106">This will show your General, Email, Calendar, and (if applicable) Premium settings and options.</span></span>
